title: Angelina Jolie is all smiles while toy shopping with her kids in Rome
text:
Angelina Jolie buys toys for her children in Rome (Picture: MEGA TheMegaAgency.com)

Angelina Jolie couldn’t stop smiling while buying toys for her kids on a shopping trip in Rome on Sunday.

The 44-year-old actress took four of her six kids on a shopping spree, reportedly buying a couple of toy guns for Zahara, 14, Shiloh, 13, and Vivienne and Knox, 11.

The adorable family can be seen joking around, laughing and smiling as they explore the multiple levels of the Italian toy shop.

Zahara even grabs herself a pair of Hulk gloves.

Angelina Jolie buys toys for her children in Rome (Picture: MEGA/TheMegaAgency.com)

Angelina Jolie buys toys for her children in Rome (Picture: MEGA/TheMegaAgency.com)

Angelina also brought the kids into a museum, as well as a book shop, before heading into the toy shop to splurge on some toys.

The family look happy as the cashier totals up the damage to the bank balance.

Angelina Jolie is spotted with her sons having a nice trip in Rome (Picture: Agostino Fabio / MEGA TheMegaAgency.com)

But it appears Maddox, 18, and Pax, 15, couldn’t be there to experience the sweet family bonding time.

Advertisement

Perhaps Maddox is already snowed under with coursework since starting university in South Korea back in August?

All of the kids (bar Maddox) came to support their mother at the Maleficent: Mistress Of Evil premiere at El Captain Theatre in Hollywood, Los Angeles at the start of this month.

But this latest family outing comes about after Angelina confessed she ‘lost herself’ when her relationship with Brad Pitt ended in 2016, 11 years after they first started dating.

When asked if she believes in fate, she explained: ‘I don’t know what my fate holds but what I am convinced of is that I am in a period of transition, like a return to my roots, a return to myself. Because, I had lost myself a bit.’

Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt split up in 2016 (Picture: Michael Kovac/Getty Images for AFI)

Clarifying, she added: ‘I think it happened as my relationship with Brad was coming to an end, then at the beginning of our separation. It was a complicated moment, where I didn’t recognise myself anymore, where I had become… how can I say… smaller, almost insignificant, even if it wasn’t necessarily visible.

‘I felt a deep and genuine sadness, I was hurt,’ she added.

The situation became even more complicated when she fell ill.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Angelina revealed: ‘On the other hand, it was interesting to reconnect with this humility and even this insignificance I was feeling. Maybe this is what being human is in the end.

‘On top of all this, I suffered some health issues. All these things settle in you and remind you of how lucky you are of being alive,’ she added.
